articles.title: Georgia YMCA camp closes after coronavirus outbreak - CNN
articles.description: An overnight YMCA camp in Georgia closed after at least 30 campers and staff members tested positive for coronavirus. Dr. Carlos del Rio, executive associate dean of Emory University School of Medicine, weighs in.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
